skill.name: ReasoningBank Adaptive Learning with AgentDB
skill.description: Implement ReasoningBank adaptive learning with AgentDB's 150x faster vector database for trajectory tracking, verdict judgment, memory distillation, and pattern recognition. Build self-learning agents that improve decision-making through experience.
skill.summary: Implement ReasoningBank adaptive learning with AgentDB's 150x faster vector database for trajectory ...
skill.author: DNYoussef

security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only TypeScript code examples and process documentation. No executable scripts, network operations, filesystem access, or external command execution detected. Contains only instructional content for implementing adaptive learning patterns.

content.value_statement: Building self-learning agents requires tracking decision trajectories and extracting patterns from experience. ReasoningBank with AgentDB provides a 5-phase system for trajectory tracking, verdict judgment, memory distillation, and pattern recognition to continuously improve decision quality.
actual_capabilities: Initialize ReasoningBank with AgentDB for vector storage
Track agent decision trajectories with reasoning and context
Judge decision verdicts using efficiency, correctness, and novelty criteria
Distill learned patterns from successful decision paths
Apply learned patterns to improve future decision-making
Measure improvement in decision quality over time
limitations: Requires AgentDB installed and configured with vector database support
Pattern mining quality depends on trajectory data volume and diversity
Does not include pre-trained models or automatic neural network training
Verdict criteria must be explicitly defined for each use case

use_cases.title: Build self-improving agents
use_cases.description: Create agents that learn from experience and improve decision quality through adaptive feedback loops.

use_cases.title: Implement meta-learning systems
use_cases.description: Develop systems that learn to learn by extracting patterns across multiple decision trajectories.

use_cases.title: Add pattern recognition
use_cases.description: Enhance existing AI systems with memory consolidation and pattern application capabilities.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Setup
prompt_templates.prompt: I want to implement adaptive learning with ReasoningBank and AgentDB. Initialize the system with trajectory tracking, verdict judgment, and pattern recognition capabilities.

prompt_templates.title: Track Decisions
prompt_templates.prompt: Set up trajectory tracking for my agent. I want to record every decision, the reasoning behind it, the context, and the outcome for later analysis.

prompt_templates.title: Evaluate Quality
prompt_templates.prompt: Help me implement a verdict judgment system. I need to evaluate decisions based on efficiency, correctness, and novelty criteria and store the verdicts.

prompt_templates.title: Extract Patterns
prompt_templates.prompt: Implement memory distillation to extract successful patterns from our trajectory history. Apply pattern mining with configurable support and confidence thresholds.

output_examples.input: Initialize ReasoningBank for tracking and learning
output: ReasoningBank initialized with trajectory tracking enabled
Ready to track decisions and apply learned patterns

best_practices: Start with a trajectory window of 1000 entries and adjust based on memory constraints
Define verdict criteria that align with your specific success metrics
Use feedback loops to continuously refine patterns from new experiences
anti_patterns: Setting verdict threshold too high causes insufficient learning data
Distilling patterns without enough trajectories leads to unreliable patterns
Ignoring pattern application defeats the purpose of adaptive learning

faq.question: Which AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code for implementing adaptive learning patterns.

faq.question: How many trajectories are needed for effective learning?
faq.answer: At least 100 trajectories with diverse outcomes are recommended for reliable pattern extraction.

faq.question: Can I integrate with existing agent frameworks?
faq.answer: Yes, ReasoningBank provides a modular API for trajectory tracking and pattern application with any agent framework.

faq.question: Is my trajectory data stored securely?
faq.answer: Trajectories are stored in AgentDB's vector database with configurable encryption and access controls.

faq.question: Why are my patterns not improving decisions?
faq.answer: Check verdict threshold settings, ensure sufficient trajectory diversity, and verify patterns are being applied in makeDecision calls.

faq.question: How does this compare to traditional RL?
faq.answer: ReasoningBank provides explicit reasoning traces and pattern extraction rather than opaque neural network weights for interpretable learning.
